sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hospital Infant Feeding Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hospital Infant Feeding Act.

sections.heading: Communication of policy. A hospital shall routinely communicate the infant feeding policy to staff in the hospital's obstetric and neonatal areas, beginning with hospital staff orientation
sections.text: The hospital shall also ensure that the policy and infant nutrition resources are posted (i) in a conspicuous

sections.heading: Application of policy. A hospital's infant feeding policy adopted under this Act must apply to all mother-infant couplets in the hospital's obstetric and neonatal areas
sections.text: Application of policy. A hospital's infant feeding policy adopted under this Act must apply to all mother-infant couplets in the hospital's obstetric and neonatal areas.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2013.
